name: SKSceneDelegate
desc: Methods that, when implemented, allow any class to participate in the SpriteKit render loop callbacks.

items.name: func update(TimeInterval, for: SKScene)
items.desc: Tells you to perform any app specific logic to update your scene.

items.name: func didEvaluateActions(for: SKScene)
items.desc: Tells you to peform any necessary logic after scene actions are evaluated.

items.name: func didSimulatePhysics(for: SKScene)
items.desc: Tells you to peform any necessary logic after physics simulations are performed.

items.name: func didApplyConstraints(for: SKScene)
items.desc: Tells you to peform any necessary logic after constraints are applied.

items.name: func didFinishUpdate(for: SKScene)
items.desc: Tells you to peform any necessary logic after the scene has finished all of the steps required to process animations.
